verses.name: Hosea 6:8
verses.text: Gilead is a city of them that work iniquity, and is polluted with blood.

verses.name: Hosea 6:9
verses.text: And as troops of robbers wait for a man, so the company of priests murder in the way by consent: for they commit lewdness.

verses.name: Hosea 6:10
verses.text: I have seen an horrible thing in the house of Israel: there is the whoredom of Ephraim, Israel is defiled.

verses.name: Hosea 6:11
verses.text: Also, O Judah, he hath set an harvest for thee, when I returned the captivity of my people.
